title: Reference against Mandviwala adjourned till May 5
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 18 (APP):An Accountability Court (AC) on Monday adjourned hearing till May 5, in Kidney Hills reference against former deputy chairman Senate Saleem Mandviwala and others.
AC-I Judge Muhammad Bashir heard the reference lodged by National Accountability Bureau (NAB).
The cross examination with the prosecution witnesses couldnâ€™t be made this day due to the absence of defence lawyers.
